row.note_internal.en: Baumstark identifies with the Babai described in BO III/1:177-81, but there Assemani applied description of one Babai by Thomas of Marga to another Babai described by Abdisho. Not clear if Babai of Gbilta is the same as Abdisho's Babai the Persian (880).

row.Biographical_Sources: Produced new trans. of poems of Gregory Nazianzen

row.note_internal.en: Baumstark says probably identical with preceding.
Baumstark identifies with Assemani's Abdisho I, but Assemani identifies with Abdisho b. Eqarbe on what basis?
Assemani identifies with Eliya b. Kanosh; Baumstark says maybe.

row.Biographical_Sources: Glossator of Gregory Nazianzen
